general: Dear Sagittarius, today, creative and intellectual activities will bring a gentle serenity to your heart. The Moon in Leo harmonizes with Venus, Mercury, and Chiron, encouraging you to nourish your soul with what brings you joy. However, a slight disorder may prompt you to change your plans when Uranus manifests in the early afternoon. Accept your limits, do not hesitate to ask for help, and remain open to advice to navigate this day as best as possible. Learning from your peers will help reduce stress and strengthen friendly bonds due to the harmonious aspect between Mercury and Chiron. You will feel more capable and mature when the Moon enters Virgo later this evening.
love: Express your feelings sincerely, it will strengthen your bond.
work: Be flexible and adapt to unexpected changes at work.
health: Take a moment to center yourself, meditation can help.
advice: Open your heart to the advice of others.
teaser: Create, adapt, and let yourself be guided.
